articles.description: Former Panthers winger Malakai Watene-Zelezniak has been forced into immediate retirement after suffering acute kidney failure late last year.
articles.content:
Former Panthers winger Malakai Watene-Zelezniak has been forced into immediate retirement after suffering acute kidney failure late last year.
Watene-Zelezniak, 29, spent four days in hospital befor… [+2148 chars]

articles.author: Anthony Colangelo
articles.title: Barty apologises for not wearing a mask in Melbourne supermarket - The Age
articles.description: Australian world No.1 Ashleigh Barty has apologised for not wearing a mask in a Melbourne supermarket.
articles.content:
I understand we all need to do our bit to keep the community safe and I will be better next time.
The 24-year-old relocated from Queensland to Melbourne last week to get ahead of any border closures… [+1021 chars]
